document_data.mainbody:
Fist Repossessions was a collection agency from the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Pammella Nortale of Nortales Hostel fell behind on paying for deliveries from Durinbold & Oathoon. Martnev Oathoon, Valued Customer Disciplinarian, mailed Pammella a notice that unless she made a minimum payment for the previous months shipment, she would be turned over to Fist Repossessions, despite the hostel being a non-profit.
